abort.reconfigure_successful:
Re-configuration was successful

Open the webhook feature in GPSLogger.

Update the webhook with the following info:

- URL: `{webhook_url}`
- Method: POST

See [the documentation]({docs_url}) for further details.

create_entry.default:
To send events to Home Assistant, you will need to set up the webhook feature in GPSLogger.

Fill in the following info:

- URL: `{webhook_url}`
- Method: POST

See [the documentation]({docs_url}) for further details.

reconfigure.description: Are you sure you want to re-configure the GPSLogger webhook?
reconfigure.title: Re-configure GPSLogger webhook

user.description: Are you sure you want to set up the GPSLogger webhook?
